Package com.amazon.clouddrive.auth

Authentication for AmazonCloudDrive

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AuthenticatedURLConnectionFactory
    Defines a factory which produces HttpURLConnection connections that are authenticated to the customer so that requests can be made against services.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AmazonAuthorizationConnectionFactory
    Factory that creates HttpURLConnections that have tokens from Login with Amazon.
    ApplicationScope
    Scope constants for Cloud Drive read write permissions that can be used with AmazonAuthorizationManager.
